description: MCP Server Configuration for Product Managers - Product Strategy Bundle

github.description: GitHub integration for issues, project boards, and feature tracking
use_cases: Manage product backlog in GitHub Issues
Track feature requests and user feedback
Create project boards for roadmap visualization
Generate release notes from closed issues
github.why_essential: Central hub for product backlog and feature tracking

linear.description: Modern issue tracking and sprint planning
use_cases: Create and prioritize product backlog items
Calculate team velocity and forecast delivery
linear.why_essential: Best-in-class issue tracking for modern product teams

posthog.description: Product analytics and feature flags for data-driven decisions
use_cases: Analyze product usage patterns for roadmap planning
Track feature adoption and engagement metrics
Manage feature flags for gradual rollouts
A/B test results and user cohort analysis
posthog.why_essential: Data-driven product decisions with usage analytics

figma.description: Design context for PRDs and user story generation
use_cases: Generate user stories from Figma designs
Extract design tokens for implementation requirements
Create acceptance criteria from design annotations
figma.why_essential: Bridge design and product requirements seamlessly

memory.description: Persistent memory for product context and patterns
memory.why_recommended: Improves product planning with historical context

filesystem.description: File system access for reading/writing product documents
filesystem.why_recommended: Essential for document-heavy product management work

playwright.description: Browser automation for UX validation and acceptance testing
use_cases: Validate acceptance criteria on live sites
playwright.why_recommended: Validates acceptance criteria and user stories
